text: Good Morning () is a 1955 Soviet comedy movie directed by Andrey Frolov.Трагический клоун Лев ДуровДоброе утро It stars Tatyana Konyukhova, Izolda Izvitskaya, and Yuri Sarantsev. == Actors == * Tatyana Konyukhova as Katya Golovan * Izolda Izvitskaya as Masha Komarova * Yuri Sarantsev as Vasya Plotnikov * Vladimir Andreyev as Lastochkin * Lev Durov as Yasha * Yevgeny Matveyev as Sergey Sudbinin * Ivan Lyubeznov as Mikhail Bobylyov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1955 movies Category:Soviet comedy movies
title: Good Morning (1955 movie)
